Subject: Flight enters Final Approach
Source Text: Definition The flight enters the Final Approach phase at the destination airport.

Subject: ATC detects flight on radar
Source Text: Origin and priority This information is normally available from ATC. The radar system detects a flight based upon the assigned SSR code and identifies when the flight crosses either a defined range / position or passes/leaves a predetermined level.

Subject: Flight identified by SSR code
Source Text: Origin and priority This information is normally available from ATC. The radar system detects a flight based upon the assigned SSR code and identifies when the flight crosses either a defined range / position or passes/leaves a predetermined level.

Subject: Flight crosses defined range/position or level
Source Text: Origin and priority This information is normally available from ATC. The radar system detects a flight based upon the assigned SSR code and identifies when the flight crosses either a defined range / position or passes/leaves a predetermined level.

Subject: Local parameters defined for timing
Source Text: Timing Dependent upon local parameters that are defined by ATC.

Subject: ELDT updated to determine new TOBT
Source Text: Effect Update of the ELDT to determine a new TOBT.

Source Text: This is often the prompt for many partners to start moving resources connected with the flight, such as positioning a parking marshal and ground handling services.

Object: ELDT updated to determine new TOBT
Source Text: Origin and priority This information is normally available from ATC. The radar system detects a flight based upon the assigned SSR code and identifies when the flight crosses either a defined range / position or passes/leaves a predetermined level.

Subject: ELDT updated to determine new TOBT
Source Text: Effect Update of the ELDT to determine a new TOBT. When a flight reaches this stage it is usu-ally between 2 and 5 minutes from landing (depending on the parameter set by ATC). This is often the prompt for many partners to start moving resources connected with the flight, such as positioning a parking marshal and ground handling services.

Subject: Network Operations informed of TTOT change
Source Text: Network Operations is informed when the TTOT changes by more than the agreed TTOT tolerance.

Subject: Verify ATC Flight Plan feasibility
Source Text: This check shall be performed to verify feasibility of the ATC Flight Plan given the updated TOBT.

Subject: TTOT tolerance check performed
Source Text: The TTOT tolerance is respected before Network Operations is informed of updated TTOT.

Source Text: This process is triggered by n the detection of the flight by radar in either FIR, TMA, or on Final Approach.
